a.text: The `npm run start` command builds your website locally and serves it through a development server, ready for you to view at http://localhost:3000/.
a.heading: Start your site

a.text: Have **5 more minutes**? Take a look at **[versioning](../tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.md)** and **[i18n](../tutorial-extras/translate-your-site.md)**.
Docusaurus automatically **creates a sidebar** from the `docs` folder.
